task.title: Setting your status
task.shortdesc: Your online status includes your availability and status message. The top of the application menu displays this information . Tap your current status to make changes. Other logged-in Sametime users can see your online status.

context.p: After you log in, by default your status is set to available. You can change your availability status to show others that you are away, in a meeting, or do not want to be disturbed.

step.cmd: Click the drop-down arrow next to your current status which is located under your name.
To add a custom message or more details to your status, click Custom status message.

info.p: A text field opens, where you can type a status message. For example, if you choose I am away, you might add a custom message such as At a doctor's appointment.
The message is removed when you select a different status.

step.cmd: When you are finished, click the return arrow ().
